column4: I read that Ubuntu is moving from xchat to gaim and I'm wondering if there are scripts to migrate settings and more importantly irc logs to gaim format?
both xchat and gaim connect to IRC, so it's up to you which client to use, nobody else
personally I use irssi rather than xchat or gaim
/ elkbuntu: yeah, I'd prefer to use the one preferred by ubuntu, but I want to migrate my settings/logs to it
